Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans travel to Washington to face the Wizards for the second time in three days.
Jose Alvarado returned to action for the first time since November.
Dejounte Murray was questionable against the Wizards with elbow soreness, but is now available.
The Wizards list Saddiq Bey (knee), Marvin Bagley III (knee), and Jordan Poole (left hip contusion) out for Sunday.
Bilal Coulibaly is questionable with a non-covid illness.
Injury Report: Zion Williamson (hamstring), Brandon Ingram (ankle), and Karlo Matkovic remain out on Sunday.
Dejounte Murray played 28 minutes on Friday, scoring 11 points and dishing 12 assists.
Jordan Poole took a hard fall late in the third quarter and briefly went to the locker room before returning to finish the game.
